channel.title: Im new to coding and looking for help please
channel.description: hello. im looking to start from a blank server with no npcs or anything. and im new to coding. all i know how to do is change dialog text colors and other very basic things. i was hoping some one could show me how to add npc's and areas such as home. and things like that. if you could itd be of great help. thank you. Lyle - aka samskswanch

item.title: Im new to coding and looking for help please
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“djvawter, post:10, topic:312351”]in your client.java file, seach for something like “addGlobalObject” or MakeGlobalObject"
here is an example, for bank this is what you would do:
addGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, 2213, 0, 10);
the xxxx is x coords and yyyy is y coords. the 2213 is the ID for bankbooth. the 0 can be changed to 0, 1, 2, 3, 4…or someshit and thats what way it faces…the 10…i dont know what the hell that is but you need it there.
some servers have make instead of add for the GlobalObject…mine has make not add. and i hope this helped bro[/quote]
First is the X coordinate, 2nd is the Y coordinate, the 3rd is the object ID, the 4th is the orientation (the way it faces) and the 5th is the tile object type.

Read full topic
item.source: Im new to coding and looking for help please

item.title: Im new to coding and looking for help please
item.dc:creator: @djvawter djvawter
item.description:
@djvawter wrote:

in your client.java file, seach for something like “addGlobalObject” or MakeGlobalObject"
here is an example, for bank this is what you would do:
addGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, 2213, 0, 10);
the xxxx is x coords and yyyy is y coords. the 2213 is the ID for bankbooth. the 0 can be changed to 0, 1, 2, 3, 4…or someshit and thats what way it faces…the 10…i dont know what the hell that is but you need it there.
some servers have make instead of add for the GlobalObject…mine has make not add. and i hope this helped bro

Read full topic

item.title: Im new to coding and looking for help please
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:8, topic:312351”][quote author=samskswanch link=topic=408752.msg3017269#msg3017269 date=1257285797]
so i should start with something like delta? if i do how would i go about editing?
[/quote]

Yes, start with delta. Even though some people would disagree with me.[/quote]
so how would i go on about moving objects like banks n stuff to make custom areas.

Read full topic

item.title: Im new to coding and looking for help please
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:5, topic:312351”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=408752.msg3017242#msg3017242 date=1257285142]

hello. im looking to start from a blank server with no npcs or anything. and im new to coding. all i know how to do is change dialog text colors and other very basic things. i was hoping some one could show me how to add npc’s and areas such as home. and things like that. if you could itd be of great help. thank you. Lyle - aka samskswanch

Imo, it’s not good starting on a blank source. It’s best to start on something that has stuff on it, so you can learn from it.

in after jaydend12

YA’LLZ BEST START WIT DEM FANCY SOURCES U C LIEK DEM FANCY DELTASCAPE SOURCES DAT EVERY1 USES LIKE DEM FANCY SERVERS LIKE 2SPECED N STUF, DEN U MOVE ONTO ICLARITY N STUFF, ITS FANCY, N STUFF
[/quote]

Couldn’t have said it better myself.

p.s. Your never on msn anymore, asshole.[/quote]

no shit what gave you that clue

Read full topic
